item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Out: Know Latest GMP, How To Check Allotment Status Online - News18
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Out: Latest GMP and How to Check Allotment Status

Last Updated: December 17, 2024, 06:56 IST

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment has been finalized, with investors receiving bank debit messages. The latest GMP stands at 24.36%, indicating a decent listing gain for investors.

  • IPO opened for subscription from December 11 to December 13 and was subscribed 28.75 times.
  • Retail investors subscribed 2.43 times, NII 15.01 times, and QIB 85.11 times.
  • The IPO price band was set at Rs 74 to Rs 78 per share.
  • Vishal Mega Mart's unlisted shares are currently trading at Rs 98.5 in the grey market.
  • The listing is scheduled for December 18 on BSE and NSE.
“The Vishal Mega Mart IPO has generated significant buzz with its robust subscription numbers and decent GMP.”

Investors can check their allotment status on BSE and NSE websites or Kfin Technologies’ portal.

This IPO reflects strong investor interest and confidence in the retail market.

item.title: AI Picks THIS Brazilian Model As The Perfect Female Body: Do You Know AI’s Defination Of Perfection? - NewsX
item.description:
AI Names Brazilian Model Karol Rosalin as Ideal Female Body

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: NewsX

The AI has designated Brazilian fitness influencer Karol Rosalin as having the 'perfect female body,' lauding her symmetry and fitness achievements. Rosalin attributes her success to disciplined training and specific dietary choices.

  • Karol Rosalin is recognized for her symmetry, health, and fitness by AI systems from Playboy Australia.
  • Rosalin achieved a ‘perfect 10’ rating based on AI analysis of her physical attributes.
  • Her fitness journey began eight years ago, focusing on strength training five days a week and daily aerobic exercises.
  • She maintains a balanced diet featuring natural ingredients.
  • Expert opinions suggest genetics and lifestyle are crucial in determining body shape and perception of perfection.
“Already, seeing the results in the mirror is a victory. Being recognized as the ‘Perfect Fitness Woman’ is incredible!” - Karol Rosalin

This recognition underscores the subjective nature of beauty and fitness standards, which vary among individuals.

item.title: GST Council May Slash Tax On Online Food Delivery Charges To 5%: Report - News18
item.description:
GST Council May Slash Tax On Online Food Delivery Charges To 5%: Report

Last Updated: December 17, 2024, 05:17 IST

The GST Council is considering reducing the goods and services tax (GST) on food delivery charges by e-commerce operators from 18% to 5%, if approved by the Finance Minister-led council, the revised tax rate could come into effect starting January 1, 2022.

  • Current tax rate for online food delivery charges is 18%.
  • Proposed reduction could lower this to 5%.
  • Food delivery platforms like Zomato and Swiggy would not be eligible for input tax credits under the new proposal.
  • This proposal comes amid increased scrutiny from tax authorities.
“Recently, the tax department directed Zomato to pay Rs 803.4 crore in taxes and fines for non-payment of certain taxes during the period from 2019 to 2022.”

This potential change aims to alleviate the financial burden on consumers and is a response to heightened scrutiny on food delivery platforms.

item.title: India's solar energy agency changes bidding policy after Adani bribery allegations: Report - The Economic Times
item.description:
India's Solar Energy Agency Adjusts Bidding Policy Following Adani Bribery Claims

Publication Date: [Insert Publication Date]

Source: [Insert Source]

An Indian government agency responsible for promoting renewable energy has altered its bidding practices to mitigate corruption risks following U.S. bribery allegations against the Adani Group.

  • The Solar Energy Corporation of India (SECI) is changing how it issues power tenders.
  • The changes come after U.S. allegations of bribery involving Adani Group in tender processes.
  • SECI will base around 75% of its new bids on specific state demand, instead of primarily seeking suppliers first.
  • Previous bidding practices, accounting for about 90% of total bids, heightened corruption risks.
  • Despite the allegations against Adani, SECI has found no basis for investigations.
  • There are concerns these allegations could hinder foreign investments in India’s renewable sector.
  • SECI set a target to bid for 15 gigawatts (GW) of power this fiscal year, but achieved only 6-7 GW so far.
The allegations against the Adani Group could temporarily cut foreign investments in India's renewable sector.

In conclusion, SECI's adjustments to its bidding policy are a direct response to concerns over corruption amidst serious allegations, indicating a significant shift in how renewable energy projects may be approached in India.

item.title: Gold Rate Today In India: Check 22 Carat Price In Your City On December 16 - News18
item.description:
Gold Rate Today In India: Check 22 Carat Price In Your City On December 16

Last Updated: December 16, 2024, 19:14 IST

As of December 16, gold prices in India remained high. The cost of 24-carat gold was Rs 77,890 per 10 grams, while 22-carat gold was priced at Rs 71,400 per 10 grams.

Key Points:

  • 24-carat gold price: Rs 77,890 per 10 grams.
  • 22-carat gold price: Rs 71,400 per 10 grams.
  • Silver was trading at Rs 92,500 per kilogram.
  • Prices vary by city; for example, in Delhi, 22-carat gold is Rs 71,550.

Conclusion:

Gold maintains its significance as an investment and is especially important in cultural celebrations in India.

item.title: Why Enviro Infra Engineers Stock Price Is Surging? Shares Up By 15% In 2 Days - News18
item.description:
Why Enviro Infra Engineers Stock Price Is Surging? Shares Up By 15% In 2 Days

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: News18

Enviro Infra Engineers has experienced a significant surge in its stock price, climbing 15% in just two days, following a strong market debut that saw shares listed at a nearly 50% premium over their issue price.

  • Shares rose by 7% on December 16, reaching Rs 318.90.
  • The stock has doubled from its IPO price of Rs 148.
  • Investor confidence is driven by demand for sustainable water infrastructure solutions.
  • The IPO was oversubscribed 89.90 times, indicating strong market interest.
  • Prominent investors like Mukul Agarwal and Sunil Singhania back the company.
“The surge in Enviro Infra Engineers’ stock price can be attributed to growing demand for sustainable water infrastructure solutions,” analysts state.

This surge reflects not just a momentary spike but also a growing optimism about the company's long-term prospects in the sustainable infrastructure sector.

item.title: Tax panel may consider lowering GST on online food delivery fees, report says - The Economic Times
item.description:
Tax Panel Considers Reducing GST on Online Food Delivery Fees

Publication Date: N/A Source: CNBC-TV18

The GST Council is contemplating a reduction of the tax on food delivery charges from e-commerce operators from 18% to 5%, potentially taking effect from January 1, 2022.

  • The proposed tax cut applies to food delivery platforms like Zomato and Swiggy.
  • Platforms would not be able to claim tax credits following this adjustment.
  • Zomato faces an order to pay 8.04 billion rupees in taxes and fines for non-payment from 2019 to 2022.
“The tax cut would not allow food delivery platforms such as Zomato and Swiggy to claim tax credits.”

This proposed tax reduction could significantly impact the food delivery sector and its profitability, especially amid ongoing financial challenges facing these companies.

item.title: Gold appreciates moderately on lower yields, weak US data - FXStreet
item.description:
Gold Appreciates Moderately on Lower Yields and Weak US Data

Publication Date: December 18, 2023 | Source: FXStreet

Gold has opened the week on a moderately positive note due to weak US manufacturing data and lower US Treasury yields, impacting the strength of the US Dollar.

  • Gold is trading moderately higher as the US Dollar rally stalled.
  • Weak US manufacturing data and lower US yields are negatively affecting the Greenback.
  • XAU/USD is close to the $2,635 support area.
"The market is almost fully pricing an interest rate cut, but only gradual easing next year."

The ongoing geopolitical tensions and market expectations surrounding the Federal Reserve's decision are influencing gold's trading status.

item.title: ‘The Nvidia Way’ review: The hard work of tech mastery | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
‘The Nvidia Way’ review: The hard work of tech mastery

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Company Business News

The origin story of Nvidia is starkly contrasted with other tech legends, revealing a unique journey from humble beginnings to a tech powerhouse. The stock price of Nvidia has seen remarkable growth, indicating its importance and influence in the tech industry.

  • Nvidia started in a San Jose Denny's in 1992 with three founders brainstorming over coffee.
  • The company's stock has increased from around $6 in January 2020 to nearly $140 today.
“Nvidia’s staggering ascent says anything, it is that mythical status is imminent.”

This review highlights the potential legacy of Nvidia's founders and its innovative journey in the tech world.

item.title: How ARM (ARM) And Qualcomm (QCOM) Can Turn A Courtroom Battle Into Mutual Success - Yahoo Finance
item.description:
How ARM (ARM) And Qualcomm (QCOM) Can Turn A Courtroom Battle Into Mutual Success

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Financial News

ARM Holdings and Qualcomm are involved in a complicated legal dispute regarding intellectual property rights, triggered by Qualcomm's acquisition of a startup that held ARM’s technology licenses. This case is crucial for both companies as it impacts their revenues and technological capabilities.

  • The two companies have been in a legal battle for two years over licensing agreements.
  • Qualcomm's acquisition of Nuvia was strategic, despite complications regarding ARM licenses.
  • ARM risks losing 11% of its revenue if its licensing deal with Qualcomm is canceled.
  • Qualcomm's chip production relies heavily on the ARM licensing for its AI laptops and Snapdragon chips.
  • The most favorable outcome for ARM would be to win the case and renegotiate the licensing deal for better terms.
  • For Qualcomm, maintaining access to ARM technology is crucial, even if it comes at a higher cost.
“This also poses a big risk for ARM, which is why we believe a settlement is likely soon.”

The ongoing legal situation highlights the interdependence of ARM and Qualcomm, with potential paths towards resolution that could benefit both companies.

item.title: Tech view: Nifty closes below 100 DEMA; uptrend intact. How to trade tomorrow - The Economic Times
item.description:
Tech view: Nifty closes below 100 DEMA; uptrend intact. How to trade tomorrow

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Economic Times

The article discusses the Nifty's market movements, highlighting its current position in an uptrend and key levels to watch for potential trading opportunities.

  • Nifty is in an uptrend on long-term weekly charts despite closing below its 100 DEMA.
  • Immediate support is at 24,550 and resistance is at 24,800.
  • Technical analysis suggests a possible buy-on-dip strategy as consolidation is expected.
  • Experts propose short-term targets and stress the importance of observing key levels.
“As long as the index holds above it, traders are advised to adopt a buy-on-dips strategy.” - Hrishikesh Yedve, Asit C. Mehta Investment Intermediates

The Nifty remains a focal point for traders, with experts suggesting active monitoring of key support and resistance levels to inform trading strategies.

item.title: MobiKwik IPO allotment status check online: Applied for shares? Got or not? NSE, BSE Link Intime website to track LIVE - ET Now
item.description:
MobiKwik IPO allotment status check online: Applied for shares? Got or not?

Updated: Dec 16, 2024 | Source: ET Now

The MobiKwik IPO has experienced significant interest, achieving a subscription rate of 119.38 times as the offer concluded, with a high level of participation from various investor categories.

  • The initial public offer (IPO) of MobiKwik raised Rs 572 crore.
  • It received bids for over 1.41 billion shares, significantly above the 118.71 million shares on offer.
  • The allotment date is expected on December 16, 2024.
  • Investors can check their allotment status via NSE, BSE, and LinkIntime websites.
  • The company has set a share price band of Rs 265-279.
  • This IPO marks MobiKwik's second attempt after its initial plans in 2021 were shelved.
“On Tuesday, One MobiKwik Systems said it garnered Rs 257 crore from anchor investors.”

MobiKwik's IPO signifies a critical moment for the company, aiming for a successful market entry after overcoming previous hurdles.

item.title: YouTuber slams ‘filthy’ Air India business class flight for ‘miserable’ nine-hour experience - Hindustan Times
item.description:
YouTuber Criticizes Air India's 'Filthy' Business Class Experience

Date: Dec 16, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

A travel influencer, Drew Binsky, criticized Air India for a disastrous business class flight experience that he labeled the worst of his life.

  • Binsky traveled from London to Amritsar, paying $750 for the business class upgrade.
  • He faced issues such as a broken seat, cramped space, and a dirty meal setting.
  • The in-flight entertainment was outdated, and WiFi connectivity was poor.
  • He found the amenities lacking, comparing them to those of a one-star motel.
  • Despite the complaints, Air India has not yet responded to his criticisms.
“Thank you Air India for this miserable nine-hour experience which I spent $750 to upgrade for.”

This incident highlights ongoing concerns about airline service quality, especially in premium offerings, and emphasizes the need for airlines to maintain standards.

item.title: Cheapest Hybrid 7-Seater Spotted? - MotorOctane
item.description:
Cheapest Hybrid 7-Seater Spotted?

Publication Date: December 2024   |   Source: MotorOctane

The automotive industry is gearing up for the Bharat Mobility show, with brands preparing to unveil new models. Recently, spy shots emerged of a new Maruti SUV, suspected to be the Grand Vitara facelift or its 7-seater variant.

  • Maruti's new e-Vitara SUV is also expected to launch shortly.
  • The spy shots indicate a new model featuring a closed grille and other slight changes, but not the e-Vitara due to the placement of the charging point.
  • Industry speculations suggest this could be the Grand Vitara facelift.
  • The new features include split LED headlamps, updated interiors, and possibly a larger 10.25-inch infotainment screen.
“Currently not much of the details of this new Maruti SUV are disclosed. However, as we near the Bharat Mobility Expo, we expect more details to be revealed.”

The new Grand Vitara is anticipated to create a buzz in the upcoming Bharat Mobility Expo with more details expected soon.
